author: Graham Lawton
title: Will the spread of covid-19 be affected by changing seasons?
description: The factors that cause flu to decline in spring might apply to covid-19 too. But we don’t know yet if warm weather can curb the spread of the coronavirus
content:
By Graham Lawton
The World Health Organization warns covid-19 is spreading in areas with hot and humid weather
Amer Ghazzal/Alamy
In the northern hemisphere, as winter ends, cases of seasonal flu dwindle. Could the same happen with covid-19?
Flu surges in… [+4097 chars]
